DOC.brief_title: Cognitive Behavioral Social Skills Training Improving Social Functioning People With Schizophrenia
DOC.detailed_description: Schizophrenia chronic , severe , disable brain disorder . People schizophrenia sometimes hear voice others n't hear , believe others broadcast thought world , become convinced others plot harm . These symptom make difficult people schizophrenia interact normally establish healthy social relationship others . Cognitive Behavioral Social Skills Training ( CBSST ) group behavioral therapy intervention focus improve cognitive metacognitive impairment social skill deficit interfere normal function people schizophrenia . Goal-focused supportive contact ( GFSC ) group therapy intervention focus help people schizophrenia verbalize problem worry seek advice fellow group member . This study evaluate effectiveness CBSST versus GFSC improve social function people schizophrenia . The study assess change cognition , psychotic symptom , use psychiatric healthcare service . Participants open label study randomly assign one follow treatment group : treatment usual ( TAU ) plus CBSST TAU plus GFSC . Both intervention consist 2-hour therapy session weekly 36 week . Groups receive intervention exceed ten people . CBSST integrate cognitive therapy , social skill training , neurocognitive compensatory aid . Cognitive therapy help participant challenge unhelpful thought build communication problem-solving skill . Participants receive workbook describe skill contain homework assignment . GFSC focus empower participant share problem , worry , concern others face similar issue . Participants share advice , therapists teach skill . Outcomes assess Months 4.5 , 9 , 15 , 21 participant .
